description.en_US: Here you can set a visualization of products. You can switch ot at any moment.
You can select all needed products and then select the action you need. There are standard actions and the ones you create yourself.
Here you can see the quick search menu. You can sort it by category or product.
Here is the root to the product. It includes parent products.
Here you can execute actions for current product.

In the navigation tab you can click any element to fast-trek you into it. You can add any tabs or modify any existing ones. Tabs consist of tabs for product fields and simple (usually one-to one) links and linked relationships such as attributes or files that can have their own values.
You can filter products using these filters.
You can filter products using these filters.
In the end there is a stream that shows all changes made to the product for all the links or fields you wish to be tracked.
